text: Paul van der Ploeg (born 9 November 1989) is an Australian cyclist, specializing cross-country mountain biking. ==Major results== ===Road=== ;2013 : 1st Stage 1 Tour de Borneo ;2015 : 1st Prologue Tour de Perth ===Cyclo- cross=== ;2015-2016 : 1st 20px National Cyclo-cross Championships ===Mountain=== ;2008 : 1st 20px Under-23 National Cross-country Championships ;2010 : 1st 20px Under-23 Oceania Cross-country Championships : 1st 20px Under-23 National Cross-country Championships ;2012 : 3rd Oceania 4-cross Championships ;2013 : 1st 20px World Cross-country Eliminator Championships : 1st 20px National Cross-country Eliminator Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Oceania Cross-country Eliminator Championships : 1st 20px National Cross- country Eliminator Championships ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Australian male cyclists
title: Paul van der Ploeg
